Package com.deco2800.game.entities

Class StructureService

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.entities.EntityService
com.deco2800.game.entities.StructureService
public class StructureService extends EntityService
Provides a global access point for entities to register themselves. This allows for iterating over entities to perform updates each loop. All game entities should be registered here. Avoid adding additional state here! Global access is often the easy but incorrect answer to sharing data.

      public static void triggerBuildEvent(String name, SortedMap<String,com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> structureRects)
      Builds a structure at mouse position
      Parameters:
      name - name of the structure in game entity list
      structureRects - map of all structure selection rectangles to the structure name in game entity list

    • handleClickedStructures

      public static boolean[] handleClickedStructures(int screenX, int screenY, SortedMap<String,com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> structureRects, boolean resourceBuildState, boolean buildEvent)
      Checks if a structure on the map has been clicked. If it has been clicked then that structure gets removed from the game
      Parameters:
      screenX - The x coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
      screenY - The y coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
      structureRects - map of all structure selection rectangles to the structure name in game entity list
      resourceBuildState - true if building resource building false otherwise
      buildEvent - true if currently in a build event false otherwise
      Returns:
      list of booleans[]{true if the point (screenX, screenY) is clear of structures else return false, resourceBuildState, buildEvent}

    • toggleBuildState

      public static boolean toggleBuildState(boolean buildState)
      Toggles the build state of the player
      Parameters:
      buildState - true if currently in build state false otherwise
